abstract: Video apparently showing San Francisco police officers roughly restraining black man with prosthetic leg causes ruckus after it is posted online.
lead_paragraph: The video, which was taken on Aug. 4, shows police officers roughly restraining a black man with a prosthetic leg, pinning him to the ground and at points kneeling on the prosthesis.

headline.main: Video of Man Restrained by San Francisco Police Causes Stir
headline.print_headline: Video of Man Restrained by Officers Causes Stir

snippet: The video, which was taken on Aug. 4, shows police officers roughly restraining a black man with a prosthetic leg, pinning him to the ground and at points kneeling on the prosthesis.
